name: Chumbaliv
description:
THIS GAME IS A SO CALLED "POLISHED PROTOTYPE". IT CONTAINS THE INTRO AND FIRST OF THE FOUR ACTIVITIES, WHICH YOU CAN DO WITH NO TIME RESTRICTION.

Land of Chumbaliv is a fairy land with magical creatures and a princess Ela to rule them all. The princess got sick and needs healthy yummies to get back to health and strength.

Intro song:

In the land of Chumbaliv

Where no virus can live

We march forward to have some fun

Get up and run!

Run to the land of Chumbaliv

And take what it could give:

Healthy snacks and funny games

And I’m James!

Gameplay

Players can do various physics-based activities. Every activity gives a healthy snack to the player. Player needs to collect X snacks and give to the ill princess, so she would get healthy.

Gameplay is based on funky physics simulations, and the player needs to endure for a given time while keeping the physics mayhem as low as possible.

Activities
  • Skipping Rope
  • “Guma”
  • “Škôlka”
  • Swing

Created by me alone.
Original songwriting and composing by me.
Art bought on Asset store.

Prototype created for Bratislava Game Jam "Stay Home Edition". Was meant to be a full game, but you know.
